body:
This PR has https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/14376 as a prerequisite; changes to spack core will be merged in that one and then I'll rebase this branch.

---

- Add a new package VecCore as a Spack-based dependency rather than having VecGeom's cmake auto-download and install
- Prevent auto-downloading of unused test data during VecGeom installation
- Use target microarchitecture instead of variant to determine instruction set
- Add shared library and CUDA support to VecGeom
- Add GDML and ROOT support to VecGeom
- Update a ROOT dependency (Davix) because of a version compatibility issue declared by ROOT
title: Update and exetend VecGeom
